title: A Better Candidate For Pantheon's New Lore Archetype

replies.body: It'd certainly be a less jarring tonal shift than pantheon.
Especially since pantheon's new lore pretty much literally is a detailed brand lore, give or take a couple elements.
Hell, it's hard to find a champion where it would make a more jarring tonal shift than pantheon.

Yeah.
I mean his quotes alone are leading towards that.
"This body is just one of many"
"Some say the world will end in fire"
"I am the fire that cleanses the world"

The concept of new Pantheon beeing more of a villain is totally okay because is supposed to be some sort of war demi-god aspect.
Im also okay with him hating Leona, Aurelion, Diana and Taric. Especially Taric given his paladin like nature or Aurelion who is kind of a grandpa to every star and living being. But Pantheon beeing somewhat like a "parasite" is really weird and Brand sounds a lot better as a fire elemental burning through every human, one by one.
